events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster, specifically for the software developer role.
A recruiter experienced in technical hiring has been assigned to your case to guide you through the upcoming steps.
The initial screening interview went well, highlighting your experience in software engineering and your proficiency in relevant technologies.
Thank you for promptly sending your detailed responses to our technical questions; it helped us better understand your skill set.
We have scheduled a technical interview with our senior engineers to further assess your coding and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview was completed successfully; you demonstrated strong knowledge in system design and coding practices.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit and to address any questions you may have regarding benefits and policies.
The HR interview went positively, with mutual agreement on the role expectations and company values.
We have proposed a competitive job offer including salary, benefits, and other perks that we hope meet your expectations.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about the opportunity to join our engineering team.
We are delighted to confirm that you have accepted the offer and are eager to start your journey with us.
Your onboarding process has started with an introduction to the team, setup of your development environment, and initial training sessions.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully, and you are officially part of our engineering department.
